description:
Midge and the others head inside the Mother Tree and encounter a bug-like robot that calls itself Skeleton B. The robot reveals the true purpose of the plant dome and a secret plan involving Negum 13. The real insects find themselves suddenly in a desperate struggle to stop Skeleton B from his mission to carry out this plan. Can Midge and the others stop Skeleton B from trying to implement the secret plan? And will they be able to restore the peace and prosperity of the plant dome that is home for Jose, Claudia, and Prince Sulkosky?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senritsu! Plant`s Dome no Shinjitsu / Robot Konchuu o Oe!
Shudder! The Truth of the Plant Dome / After the Robotic Insects!
戦慄! プランツドームの真実 / ロボット昆虫を追え!
